description:
Section 73 Application for the variation of Condition 2 (personal permission) of planning consent P091058 dated 21/08/2009 for the Retrospective permission for change of use of units 2A, 3 (ground floor) 6 (first floor) and 9 (second floor) from B1 to D1 (non-residential education) use for a school of acting and directing.

The variation of condition 2 seeks to change the permitted educational end user from the "The Academy of Science of Acting and Directing" and replace it with the "University of London" as the new educational operator on the site.
decision_conditions: REASON: The proposal fails to provide robust evidence to justify the loss or demonstrate a quantitive lack of demand for the B1 business floorspace. As such the proposal is considered contrary to policies CS1 & CS 13 of the Islington Core Strategy and policy DM5.2 of Islington's Development Management Policies.
